item.title: [Links] Ask HN: What overlooked class of tools should a self-taught programmer look into | Hacker News
item.description: 🍊 HN Link 🌎 Makefile · master · Internet Cleanup Foundation / web security map · GitLab 🌎 Microsoft will ship a full Linux kernel in Windows 10 - The Verge 🌎 Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2019 🌎 :: Darch 🌎 GitHub - pauldotknopf/darch-recipes: My operating systems, using Darch. 🌎 Automation and Make 🌎 Welcome to Fabric! — Fabric documentation 🌎 Welcome to Invoke! — Invoke documentation 🌎 MSYS2 🌎 Make for Windows

item.title: [Links] Ask HN: What automation tools have you used to replace mundane activities? | Hacker News
item.description: 🍊 HN Link 🌎 GitHub - huginn/huginn: Create agents that monitor and act on your behalf. Your agents are standing by! 🌎 ScrapingBee - Web Scraping API 🌎 How to set Goals - RescueTime 🌎 Little Birdie - Post HN comments to Slack 🌎 Gain Total Control of Your Money with YNAB 🌎 GitHub - buzzlawless/ynab-live-import: Automatically import transactions to YNAB in real-time! 🌎 Payment Services Directive - Wikipedia 🌎 GitHub - microsoft/playwright: Playwright is a framework for Web Testing and Automation.

item.title: [Links] Ask HN: What do you automate in your life and work? | Hacker News

item.title: [Links] Ask HN: What's are your personal automations? | Hacker News
item.description: 🍊 HN Link 🌎 Breadmakers | Zojirushi.com 🌎 Random Daily Art | Have art delivered straight to your inbox every day. 🌎 Personal CRM done right - Monica 🌎 What data on myself I collect and why? | beepb00p 🌎 In search of a better job scheduler | beepb00p 🌎 GitHub - karlicoss/axol: Personal news feed: search for results on Reddit/Pinboard/Twitter/Hackernews and read as RSS 🌎 GitHub - sabrehagen/desktop-environment: ☁️ From tty to production in one command, on the desktop and in the cloud.
